### SCENE 14 â€“ Late-Night Phone Call  

_Hero is writing a script when Swarna calls. He waits until the last ring, then answers._

**Hero:** Helloâ€¦  
**Swarna:** Haâ€¦ HIâ€¦!  
**Hero:** Hiâ€¦ _(hesitates)_ Enti intha late-night call chesaru?  
**Swarna:** *Chesaru na..?*  
**Hero:** Sorryâ€”*chesavuuu.*  
**Swarna:** Haha, adhiâ€¦ aaâ€¦  
**Hero:** Parledhu, cheppandiâ€¦ I mean cheppu.  
**Swarna:** Adhiâ€¦ nuvvu short films teestav kada. Mee shooting appudu nenu kuda ravoccha?  
**Hero:** Adhi adagadaniki call chesava?  
**Swarna:** Ha.  
**Hero:** Ya, yaâ€”*you are welcome.*  
**Swarna:** Ante, adhiâ€¦ chinnappatinundi **chaduvu, studies** ane pencharu ma daddy. Nenu okkasari kuda movie shootings chudaledhu. Soâ€¦  
**Hero:** Idhi oka issue ena? Shoot appudu definite-ga pilusta. Chaduvu kakunda ee prapancham lo inka chala unayi.  
**Swarna:** Exactly. Oka middle-class family lo untu *baga chaduvutav* ani noted aythe, school-ki bag tho paatu valla **expectations** kuda carry cheyyaliâ€”*literally* no time for anything.  
**Hero:** Donâ€™t worry. Iâ€™ll show you the best part of the world. Ippatiki *selavu*â€”night aindhi kada. ðŸ˜†  
**Swarna:** Yeahâ€¦ byeâ€¦
